success_criteria: Unit test coverage > 90%; 100% of unit tests pass; Static analysis (SonarQube) reports 0 new critical bugs or security hotspots.
escalation_procedure: Tech Lead review for any requested bypass.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and simple bugs from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: 100% of security integration tests (RBAC, Sandbox) must pass. Performance benchmark (REQ-PERF-DTR-002) must pass. Overall integration test suite pass rate > 98%.
failure_action: Mark build as failed; Rollback deployment to dev environment; Alert on-call developer.
tools_used: GitHub Actions, xUnit Test Host, Playwright
escalation_procedure: Automatic alert to team channel; Triage in daily stand-up.
business_impact: Prevents critical security and performance regressions from reaching staging.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for deployment to Staging
success_criteria: E2E test suite for critical user journeys pass rate > 95%. No new P0 or P1 bugs identified during a 1-day stabilization period. Manual exploratory testing complete and signed off by QA lead.
failure_action: Block promotion to production. Schedule bug-fix sprint.
business_impact: Ensures release candidate is stable and meets business requirements before production deployment.
